Description:
The Technomancer - a continuation of Mars: War Logs, in which the main character will visit the new areas on Mars - from ghost towns to huge caverns beneath the polar caps, moving away from the secret police and the people fighting with various opponents. Sooner or later it had to start, we moved to Mars, but began what we had feared. The war for water has ruined a lot of lives, dividing by many different barricades and harden the overall situation. You will manage one of tehnomantov, electricity masters. The choice will be given just three fighting styles. As enemies: all kinds of looters, not the most friendly, fauna and a couple of other factions. In the game there is a ramified network of dialogues and your choice will affect your future. Also, we should expect crafting weapons and armor, which will undoubtedly affect your superiority in battle.

Features:
Great story in the entourage of the post-apocalyptic Red Planet

Three combat style with deep character customization

In-depth crafting

The world that reacts to your decisions
